short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate mock data for testing purposes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Mock Data Generator Chrome Extension is a powerful tool designed to help developers, designers, testers, and data analysts quickly generate a variety of mock data for their projects. 

Whether you need personal identification information, professional details, addresses, financial information, device information, temporal data, miscellaneous items, or specific data types, this extension has you covered.

Features:

a. Wide Range of Categories: Choose from multiple categories such as Personal Identification, Professional Information, Address Information, Financial Information, Device Information, Temporal Information, Miscellaneous, and Data Types.

b. Customizable Data Types: Select the type of data you need under each category, such as First Name, Email Address, Job Title, Street Address, Amount, Phone Name, etc.

c. Flexible Quantity: Specify the number of data items you need, from 1 to 100.

d. Easy Data Generation: Simply fill in the form and click the "Generate Data" button to get your mock data.

c. Convenient Data Display: Generated data is displayed in a clean, organized container with an easy-to-use "Copy to Clipboard" button.

d. User-Friendly Interface: The extension features a simple and intuitive design, making it easy to generate mock data on the go.

Enhance your development and testing processes with the Mock Data Generator Chrome Extension. 

Save time and effort by quickly generating the mock data you need.
